highlights.title: 5th in Australia — U18 Age Group
highlights.description: Ranked 5th in the country for his age group, a testament to years of dedicated training and competitive excellence.

highlights.title: 32nd in Australia — Overall National Ranking
highlights.description: Achieved an overall national ranking of 32nd across all age groups — an outstanding accomplishment for a player of his age.

highlights.title: NSW State Representative
highlights.description: Selected to represent NSW at the national table tennis championships, competing against the best players in the country.

videos.title: Highlights
videos.description: Match footage and highlights from Lachlan's competitive career.
